conbody.p: data formatsoverviewEach origin and destination stage that processes different types of data formats has a "Data Formats" section in the stage documentation. Review the Data Formats section for information about how each stage processes each data format.

The way stages process data can be similar based on the stage type and the type of data being processed. For example, origins that process messages will usually process data formats similarly. However, you should check the Data Formats section for the stage to be sure.

This chapter includes the details that are too complex to summarize in the Data Formats sections. If you have browsed and discovered this chapter and want to read on, feel free. But please note that the Data Formats sections in the stage documentation include links to this chapter where relevant.
